metadata.title: CVE-2017-16830 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The print_gnu_property_note function in readelf.c in GNU Binutils 2.29.1does not have integer-overflow protection on 32-bit platforms, which allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation violation andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
